segments.text: This kitchen is a disaster waiting to happen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The sink's overflowing, water everywhere, and she just stands there polishing that stupid plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Doesn't she hear the water splashing? It's ridiculous.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Now the kids are raiding the cookie jar like little thieves.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: That boy on the stoolâ€”it's tilting back; he's going to crash down.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And the girl's egging him on, reaching for her share.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They're breaking the rules right under her nose.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The puddle's spreading; the floor will be ruined.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't believe no one's noticing this mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Those cookies are probably stale anyway, not worth the risk.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The window shows a nice garden, but who cares with this insanity inside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Turn off the faucet already; it's infuriating!
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This whole scene makes my blood boil.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The apron she's wearing is getting wet; serves her right for not paying attention.
segments.speaker: PAR
